# Basketball: 
Conquer the VR basketball court and win with precise shots. Experience realistic ball physics!

# Archery: 
In VR archery, adjust for wind and distance to shoot arrows with precision and score high.
{3683892668554100}
# Volleyball: 
Enjoy a 2 vs 2 team volleyball game on a pro court. Compete against smart AI or real players for intense gameplay.

# Billiards:
 Play VR billiards, adjusting the angle and power of your shots to outsmart your opponent with a lifelike physics engine.
{1103977420875261}
# Bowling: 
For the perfect game in VR bowling, adjust the angle and strength and beat more pins than your opponent.

# Darts: 
Enjoy a VR darts game, competing with friends or practicing alone.
{1115816616311707}
# Tennis: 
Play VR tennis on clay, grass, or hard courts, serving, volleying, and smashing with realistic physics.

# Golf: 
Play VR golf on unique courses, perfecting your swing and competing in tournaments.
{1787233821756336}
# Squash: 
Engage in fast-paced VR squash, competing on a professional court.

# Baseball: 
Hit home runs and pitch fastballs in VR baseball, competing in various modes.
{1094861784931502}
# Boxing: 
Step into the VR boxing ring, punching, dodging, and blocking in real time.

# Beat Boxing: 
Exercise by punching to the music in Beat Boxing VR for an energetic workout.

# Heavy Bag: 
Practice boxing skills in VR, improving speed and strength.
{1469268270676746}
# PingPong: 
Play fast-paced VR table tennis, requiring precision and quick reflexes.

changelog.change_log: Some issues have been fixed where the ball was not being hit or the controller's speed was not being registered in some games.

AIO 1.1.1 Update
■ General
- Fixed issue when changing events during multiplayer waiting.
■Table Tennis
- Fixed issue where the serve wasn't hitting.
- Added deuce limit (max 15 points).
■ Tennis
- Added deuce limit (max 4 times).
- Fixed issue with ball floating too high.
- Removed scoring on ground during rallies.
■ Volleyball
- Added deuce limit (max 10 points).
■ Squash
- Fixed scoring judgment error.
- Increased speed of Flame item by 1.5x

Notice!
Several issues have occurred since the V_0.9.7 version update. This issue has been resolved since 2023-02-24. Sorry for the inconvenience.
- Problems not repositioning
- Controller is not vibrating
- a problem that sounds strange to the audio

long time no See! It's been a while since I've had an update.
This update has made several UI improvements and leaderboard improvements. There will be a bigger update soon. Please be looking forward for it!

V_0.9.7 Update

Common
- New leaderboard (by season, by event)
- Notice board added
- Quick Match UI updates in real time
- Multiplayer voice chat on/off
- New character decoration items
- Improved spectators (animations added)
- Optimized background graphics
- General system stabilization and performance improvements.
- Modified leaderboard title name to show the current season.


Bugfixes
- Fixed an issue with the serve in Ping Pong.
- Fixed weak hit in tennis.
- Fixed black screen issue during game play.


Basketball, baseball, tennis, and table tennis have improved physics

Serve methods for table tennis and tennis have been added (throw the ball and hit it)

Billiards
- Fixed an issue where the free ball was not released after a foul (trigger button not working).
- Fixed glare issue with the ball.
- Fixed an issue where opponent's character uniform appeared differently in multiplayer.


Ping Pong
- Reduced Paddle vibration time.
- Reduced ball spin effect.


Character Customization
- Fixed a problem where the eye color for female characters could not be changed.

long time no See! It's been a while since I've had an update.
This update has made several UI improvements and leaderboard improvements. There will be a bigger update soon. Please be looking forward for it!

V_0.9.7 Update

Common
- New leaderboard (by season, by event)
- Notice board added
- Quick Match UI updates in real time
- Multiplayer voice chat on/off
- New character decoration items
- Improved spectators (animations added)
- Optimized background graphics
- General system stabilization and performance improvements.
- Modified leaderboard title name to show the current season.


Bugfixes
- Fixed an issue with the serve in Ping Pong.
- Fixed weak hit in tennis.
- Fixed black screen issue during game play.


Basketball, baseball, tennis, and table tennis have improved physics

Serve methods for table tennis and tennis have been added (throw the ball and hit it)

Billiards
- Fixed an issue where the free ball was not released after a foul (trigger button not working).
- Fixed glare issue with the ball.
- Fixed an issue where opponent's character uniform appeared differently in multiplayer.


Ping Pong
- Reduced Paddle vibration time.
- Reduced ball spin effect.


Character Customization
- Fixed a problem where the eye color for female characters could not be changed.

Hotfix!

The matchmaking method has been changed
-Users' inconvenience was reported due to different network delay rates in the 0.9.2 version. Initial matching is matched to the server with the best network communication, but you can switch servers.

0.9.2 Version Update!!
 

Enjoy Multi-Play!
- Improved multi-matching systems. There is no UI to select a server. People from all over the world gather on the most comfortable server.
- Added boxing multiplayer. Enjoy a fun boxing game with your friends!
- We fixed the bug that turns the screen white when the opponent's player's match is disconnected in the online match.

 

Some improvements
- Changed the appearance of several accessory items.
- Improved the part where loading becomes slow due to overload of the leaderboard.

 

Bowling
- Fixed a bug that could steal AI's bowling ball in bowling single game mode.
- Corrected the part where the bowling pin fell intermittently and the score was calculated incorrectly.

 

Badminton
- The part where the score is calculated incorrectly when the shuttlecock is hit under the badminton net has been corrected.

 

Tennis
- When the first ball failed, We corrected the part where the score was calculated incorrectly even though I served the second ball properly.

Hotfix!

Common
- We revised the case where the Result of the game is judged differently if the opponent's connection is cut off when the match is matched by event in the lobby.
- We revised the case where the actual results of the game are judged differently in several games, including table tennis games. [We added a protective cord]
- We fixed the bug that turns the screen white when the opponent's player's match is disconnected in the online match.


Badminton, Ping-Pong, Tennis
- Corrections: Players who played table tennis, tennis, and badminton lost points if they didn't hit the ball for 20 seconds.[Time limit] [2 chances in total]


Boxing
- Fixed the problem that the sound volume does not change even if the sound volume is adjusted in boxing.

Hotfix!

Boxing
- The intensity of the controller vibration has been raised.
- Changed the behavior of AI. (More dynamic steps, weaving, ducking)
- Added the behavior of AI behavior. Dash or hit additional hits when the player blocks AI attacks.

Now!! “ Real Boxing “ mode added !

V_0.9.0 Update

Are you ready to box with the champ?
“Float like a Butterfly, Sting like a Bee.”

Boxing
- 5 levels of AI singleplayer are possible.
- Featuring ultra-realistic motion capture from real boxers.
- Dynamic boxing combinations are realistically applied.
- Stay tuned ! multi-play boxing will be updated soon.


Ping-Pong
- corrected the situation in which an error occurs when the table tennis ball hits the net.

More powerful Ping-Pong physics!

V_0.8.1 Update

Ping-Pong
- Adjust the color saturation of the table tennis table and table tennis floor.
- Changed to teleport to the same place when AI is too far from the table when a decision is made in singleplayer.
- Fixed a bug where the ball was judged intermittently when it hit the edge of the table.
- Added animation of advertisement banner moving when score is changed.
- Changed so that the spin particles are generated in the direction in which the spin was placed.
- Changed the rotation direction of spin particles to be derived separately from the reverse and forward directions.


Baseball
- Fixed hit-related physics.
- Pitching related physics have been modified so that the ball can be thrown into the strike zone better.
- Fixed a base play error that occurred when there is a runner on third base and the batter hits a sacrifice fly(SF).
- Lowered the overall color saturation of the stadium.


Golf
- Set the flag to disappear when putting.
- Fixed ball trail disappearing when opponent putt in multiplayer.
- Change the flag to disappear when putting.
- Fixed the problem that the texture of the club came out black.


Basketball
- Adjusted AI's shot interval time to lower the singleplayer difficulty.

New sports, "Tennis" added !
From now , 11 Sports in 1 Game
Tennis
- Tennis, one of the most popular sports in the world, has finally been added to All-In-One Sports VR.
- Multiplayer and 5 levels of AI singleplayer are possible.
Holloween event
- 3 popular Squid Masks have been added to celebrate Halloween.
- These masks can be worn immediately without any conditions.
Bowling / Basketball
- Updated to be able to play single player with AI of 5 difficulty level.
Accessories
- 2 mask accessories have been added.
- Gas Mask / Roman Warrior Mask

V_0.7.7 HotFix!!
Modified the case where infinite loading occurs intermittently during multi-play.

V_0.7.6 Update

Baseball
Reduced pitch correction range.
Reduced ground ball probability when hitting.


Bowling
Revised the judgment on the bowling foul.
Fixed bowling pin physics to be applied naturally.
Removed automatic shooting when the ball is accidentally thrown.

V_0.7.5 HotFix!!
Fixed the problem of ping pong ball not being hit in ping pong multiplayer mode.

Hello, everyone.

The biggest update is the addition of boxing's "Heavy-bag" mode.
Smash the punching bag with your powerful fist!

V_0.7.4 Update

Baseball
Slightly adjusted the pitcher's pitching physics.
Reduced pitcher's directional physics correction.


Golf
Set to be ignored small movements of the club in the ready position.
Smoother ball rolling on the green when putting.

V_0.7.3 Update 

Cross-platform multiplayer matching update!
Now enjoy multiplayer mode on a variety of platforms!

Baseball
Fixed some betting physics.
Reduce the probability of a ground ball when betting.
Fixed the problem of not hitting the ball when hitting the left hand.


Billiards
Fixed AI cue ball position error.
Level balancing: Reduced guideline length / AI difficulty correction.


Ping-pong
Fixed the net to shake naturally in multiplayer.
Fixed a bug that sometimes freezes after scoring.


Badminton
Smashing serve is prohibited.


Basketball
Adjusted basketball reaction time.
Adjust the laser position and angle to catch the ball.
Realistically adjusted basketball throwing force.


Basketball
Adjust the laser position and angle to catch the ball.
Fixed a bug where bowling pins were pushed behind.
Fixed bowling ball spin to affect bowling pins more.


Dart
Significant improvement in throwing physics

V_0.7.0 Update / BN8

Common issue
Depending on the device, the position of hand modeling has been modified to be customized.
The position and orientation of the bat or racket have been modified.


Baseball
Modified the balance so that user can play the home run mode game longer.
Added a home run mode item. (The ball-shaped item reduces one out counter. Life +1)
Added strike zone area seen when pitching in league mode.
Modified the balance of hitting in league mode.
The Fire Bat has been modified to make a home-run easier.



Dart
Modified hand animation and dart default position.
